title: A bill to amend the Animal Welfare Act to improve the treatment of certain animals, and for other purposes.
content: Puppy Protection Act of 2001 - Amends the Animal Welfare Act to: (1) include among humane standards for animal treatment provisions respecting socialization of dogs to facilitate contact with other dogs and people, and breeding initiation and frequency of female dogs, (2) revise temporary license suspension provisions, and (3) establish mandatory suspension provisions.
